pages.text: Supplicates and entreats whatever energy of the Fey world that still lingers in this world to anchor a $(l:crafting/grove_stones)Grove Stone$().$(br2)Once anchored, the stone will light up and become animated, as well as producing leaf particles, some of which will travel to nearby $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafters$().$(br2)The stone will also begin producing grass and rare flowers.
As a $(bold)tier 1$() ritual, a grove stone is required for the ritual to be effective.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:grove_supplication/SECONDS/duration) seconds. If an inactive grove stone is not found nearby by the end of the ritual, it will fail.$(br2)$(bold)Radius:$() The ritual will search for grove stones within an area of $(ritual:grove_supplication/radius_x) and $(ritual:grove_supplication/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and by $(ritual:grove_supplication/radius_y) vertically.
